  <script>var supportsAllFeatures =
    window.Promise &&
    window.Promise.prototype.finally &&
    window.fetch &&
    window.Symbol &&
    window.CustomEvent &&
    Array.prototype.includes &&
    Element.prototype.remove &&
    Element.prototype.closest &&
    Element.prototype.attachShadow &&
    window.NodeList &&
    NodeList.prototype.forEach
;

if (!supportsAllFeatures) {
    false && console.log("Older browser detected. Initiating polyfills.");
    var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
    var script = document.createElement('script');
    script.src = "https://community.gofundme.com/dist/polyfills.min.js?h=60b69686";

        script.async = false;
    // document.write has to be used instead of append child for edge & old safari compatibility.
    document.write(script.outerHTML);
} else {
    false && console.log("Modern browser detected. No polyfills necessary");
}

if (!window.onVanillaReady) {
    window.onVanillaReady = function (handler) {
        if (typeof handler !== "function") {
            console.error("Cannot register a vanilla ready handler that is not a function.");
            return;
        }
        document.addEventListener("X-DOMContentReady", function () {
            if (!window.__VANILLA_INTERNAL_IS_READY__) {
                return;
            }
            handler(window.__VANILLA_GLOBALS_DO_NOT_USE_DIRECTLY__);
        })

        if (window.__VANILLA_INTERNAL_IS_READY__) {
            handler(window.__VANILLA_GLOBALS_DO_NOT_USE_DIRECTLY__);
        }
    }
}</script>

  <noscript>
   <style>body {visibility: visible !important;}</style>
  </noscript> 
  <script>
function modifyConnectMessaging() {
   let passwordField = document.querySelectorAll("#ConnectPassword");
   
   if (passwordField.length > 0) {
     passwordField.item(0).style.display = "none";
   }
   let items = document.querySelectorAll(".Messages.Errors ul li");
   let errMessages = items.length;
   let invalidErrMessages = 0;
   items.forEach(function(item) {
     let content = item.innerHTML;
     if (content.includes('You must agree to the')) {
       item.style.display = "none";
       invalidErrMessages += 1;
     }
     if (content.includes('Password is required')) {
       item.style.display = "none";
       invalidErrMessages += 1;
     }
   });
  
   if (invalidErrMessages == errMessages) {
     document.querySelectorAll(".Messages.Errors").forEach(function(errMess) {
       errMess.style.display = "none";
     });
   }
   let lists = document.querySelectorAll("ul li").forEach(function(list) {
     if (list.innerHTML.includes('choose a different username')) {
     		list.querySelectorAll("div").forEach(function(divs) {
          divs.style.display = "none";
        });	
     }
   });

    // let connectForm = document.querySelectorAll("form").forEach(function(forms) {
   	// if (forms.getAttribute("action") == "/entry/connect/saml?authKey=gfmcommunity") {
    //   forms.addEventListener('submit', function() {
    //   console.log("Form was submited");
    //   });
    // }
    // });
}

if (window.location.pathname.includes('entry/connect/')) {
window.addEventListener('load', function() {
   modifyConnectMessaging();
});
(function() {
    const send = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send
    XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send = function() { 
        this.addEventListener('load', function() {
             modifyConnectMessaging();
        })
        return send.apply(this, arguments)
    }
})()
}
</script> 
  <noscript> 
   <style>
                .fullPageLoader { display: none }

                body.isLoading .page {
                    max-height: initial;
                    height: initial;
                }
            </style> 
  </noscript> 
 </head> 
 <body class="Vanilla Discussions isDesktop index Section-DiscussionList isLoading dataDriven"> 
  <div id="page" class="page">
   <noscript id="themeHeader"> 
    <style>/*
 * These styles apply ONLY to the header and footer assets.
 */


* {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.footer {
    color: #333333;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    padding: 40px 0 18px;
}

.footer * {
    font-family: "Lato", sans-serif;
}

.footer-wrap {
    padding-left: 18px;
    padding-right: 18px;
    max-width: 1236px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

.footer li {
    list-style: none;
}

.footer a {
    text-decoration: none;
}
.footer a:hover {
    color: #0276b3;
}

.footer-row {
    display: block;
}

.footer-row.bottom {
    padding-top: 60px;
    font-weight: 100;
    margin-top: 24px;
    border-top: 1px solid #e4e4e4;
}

.footer-row.top .footer-col {
}

.footer-col {
    padding: 0 3px;
}

.footer-col-copyRight {
    justify-content: flex-start;
}

.footer-col-logo {
    width: 25%;
}

.footer-list:last-child {
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}

.footer-listTitle {
    color: #02a95c;
    display: inline-block;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 900;
    letter-spacing: -0.1px;
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}

.footer-link {
    list-style: none;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
}

.footer-list.legal .footer-link:not(.copyright) {
    padding-bottom: 0;
}

.footer-link:last-child {
    padding-bottom: 20;
}

.footer-link a,
.footer-link span {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 24px;
    letter-spacing: 0px;
    text-align: left;
    color: #333333;
}

.footer-link:not(.copyright) a:hover,
.footer-link:not(.copyright) span:hover {
    color: #02a95c;
    text-decoration: underline;
}

.logo {
    display: block;
    height: 3rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    width: 7rem;
}

.social-links-list {
    margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.social-links-list .social-item {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 16px;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .footer-row {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin: -3px;
    }

    .footer-col:first-child {
        margin-top: 0;
    }

    .footer-col:last-child {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }

    .footer-col-copyRight,
    .footer-col-logo {
        justify-content: center;
    }

    .footer-row.bottom {
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .footer-list.legal .footer-link {
        display: inline-block;
        margin-right: 16px;
    }

    .footer-row.bottom .social-links-list {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }
}

</style> 
   </noscript>

     <main class="Frame-body">

       <div class="Container"> 
        <div class="pill">
         Featured Videos
        </div>

        <p class="video-section-description">Our organizers share tips on spreading the word about your fundraiser, keeping up the momentum, and more.</p> 
        <ul class="video-list">

        </ul>

      <div id="after-banner-modules"> 
       <ul class="SiteTotals"> 
        <h2>Forum Stats</h2> 
        <li class="SiteTotal-Row SiteTotal-user"> <span class="SiteTotal-Number"> 1,898 </span> <span class="SiteTotal-Label"> Members </span> </li> 
        <li class="SiteTotal-Row SiteTotal-discussion"> <span class="SiteTotal-Number"> 695 </span> <span class="SiteTotal-Label"> Discussions </span> </li> 
        <li class="SiteTotal-Row SiteTotal-comment"> <span class="SiteTotal-Number"> 757 </span> <span class="SiteTotal-Label"> Comments </span> </li> 
        <li class="SiteTotal-Row SiteTotal-post"> <span class="SiteTotal-Number"> 1,452 </span> <span class="SiteTotal-Label"> Posts </span> </li> 
       </ul> 
      </div> 
      <div class="" data-react="HomeWidget" data-props="{&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Featured discussion rooms&quot;,&quot;containerOptions&quot;:{&quot;noGutter&quot;:false,&quot;viewAll&quot;:{&quot;to&quot;:&quot;\/categories&quot;},&quot;maxColumnCount&quot;:4,&quot;subtitle&quot;:[],&quot;description&quot;:&quot;Read the most popular topics&quot;},&quot;itemOptions&quot;:{&quot;box&quot;:{&quot;borderType&quot;:null}},&quot;itemData&quot;:[{&quot;to&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/community.gofundme.com\/categories\/sharing-strategies&quot;,&quot;iconUrl&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/us.v-cdn.net\/6032798\/uploads\/L03FK6HR7T12\/guyswithroses.jpg&quot;,&quot;imageUrl&quot;:&quot;https:\/\/us.v-cdn.net\/6032798\/uploads\/T9821OAW8UIC\/guyswithroses.jpg&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Sharing Strategies&quot;,&quot;description&quot;:&quot;Looking for more donors?
